text: Anna Kashfi (born Joan O'Callaghan; September 30, 1934 â€“ August 21, 2015) was a British-Indian movie actress. She had a brief Hollywood career in the 1950s. She was best known for having been married to Marlon Brando. Her first movie was The Mountain (1956). Kashfi died on August 21, 2015 in Kalama, Washington, aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Anna Kashfi bio * Anna Kashfi 'cried tears of rage' upon hearing of Marlon Brando's death Category:1934 births Category:2015 deaths Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:People from West Bengal
title: Anna Kashfi
